Subject: Unleash the Yeast
Description: Meet our Featured Guest, David Clipner, and learn how to be a beer snob in your own home. From stouts to sours and ales to IPAs, taste and compare the complexities of lifes greatest gift, beer.  21+ and ID will be required.  This is a limited attendance event.  Please sign up at Ops  Speakers include:David Clipner - Track: Food  - Duration: 50 minutes

Subject: Baking and Breaking Bread
Description: 'The most exciting thing about making bread is it's similar to making beer.' Learn how to make and recognize a great loaf of bread with our Featured Guest and professional baker, David Clipner.  Speakers include:David Clipner - Track: Food  - Duration: 50 minutes

Subject: Pirate Rum History Tastings
Description: Rum is probably one of the first things people think of when they think of pirates. We could give a fancy description of the lecture about the history of rum, but you're really just coming to drink rum-- so let's taste some different rums! 21+ and ID will be required. This is a limited attendance event.  Please sign up in advance at Ops.  Speakers include:Rathbone the Pirate, David Clipner - Track: Food  - Duration: 50 minutes

Subject: Eat Like a Pirate
Description: Cuisine is probably not the first thing people think of when they think of pirates, but the Navy food was so bad that many Navy sailors turned pirate just to escape it. Come learn about common foods eaten aboard ships during the Golden Age of piracy and take home a recipe or two to try.  Speakers include:Rathbone the Pirate, David Clipner - Track: Food  - Duration: 50 minutes
